meanings.sent1: The swipers at the store quickly scan each item.
meanings.sent2: The swipers took the items from the shelf and scanned them at the checkout.
meanings.sent3: The swipers in the game were so fast, they could steal anything!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like swipers, quickly taking in every detail of the room.
meanings.sent5: The swipers in the movie were portrayed as skilled thieves.

meanings.sent1: The swipers of the card were smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: I heard the swipers of the door as someone entered the room.
meanings.sent3: The swipers of the brush painted beautiful strokes on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: His words were like swipers, cutting through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The swipers of the wind rustled the leaves in the trees.

meanings.sent1: The cashier used the swipers to scan the products.
meanings.sent2: The swipers on the phone made it easy to navigate through the menu.
meanings.sent3: The swipers on the machine were so sensitive, they could detect even the smallest movement.
meanings.sent4: The swipers on the tablet glided smoothly across the screen.
meanings.sent5: The swipers on the laptop were worn out from constant use.
